findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials enabled can allow malicious sites to read sensitive data from the WordPress REST API on behalf of authenticated users.
findings.exploitation_steps: Create malicious webpage that makes XHR requests to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with credentials, which would succeed due to permissive CORS policy and could expose page content or user data to attacker's domain.
